subject: Soccer
African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Salomon Kalou scored in the 16th minute, Bakary Kone headed in an own goal in the 82nd, and the tournament favorite Ivory Coast clinched a quarterfinal berth at the African Cup of Nations.
snippet: Salomon Kalou scored in the 16th minute, Bakary Kone headed in an own goal in the 82nd, and the tournament favorite Ivory Coast clinched a quarterfinal berth at the African Cup of Nations.
